articles.title: Monkeypox: First deaths outside Africa in Brazil and Spain
articles.description: Brazil and Spain report fatalities from the virus, but most infections are mild and overall risk is low.
articles.content:
By Malu CursinoBBC News
Brazil and Spain have reported their first monkeypox deaths.

articles.description: Slim odds of one in 300 million did not deter wishful Americans from snapping up tickets by the stack.
articles.content:

articles.title: Islamic State group: Canadian narrator of propaganda videos jailed
